author: Corbit
subtitle: Portal 2 in Minecraft - Chapter 1 entirely in Minecraft (Without mods)
description:
Portal 2 is a puzzle game released by Valve in 2011, and is widely regarded as the best game of all time.

This map is the Minecraft "port"/recreation of this humorous space-age game, bringing all of the functionality from Portal 2 to Minecraft without any mods.

The map is a short, entirely vanilla experience of Chapter 1, aiming to invoke nostalgia and add to the Portal 2 experience.
optifine: OptiFine is used to customise the entity models
